page.title: 02The Concert
page.content: As part of the Dymock 900 Festival all the family went to see the Leclair String Quartet in Dymock Church on September 13th 1985. There were two ladies and two men. One lady played the violin and the othet the cello. One man played the viola and the other had another violin. The concert started at 7.30 p.m. Soon we had an interval and we had a drink and a biscuit but I didn't like the biscuit so I gave it to Amy. Soon I needed the toilet and Dad had to take me to the pub and let me go there. When we got back it had started. After about half an hour we had to go home but I had enjoyed myself very much. (Faye Hinton, aged 8)
